definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
appetizer/small side dish/easy job/piece of cake/see also 小菜一碟[xiao3 cai4 yi1 die2]
to sit on the ground or the floor (idiom)
to push lightly/to flick to one side/to get rid of
to sit in a circle/seated around (a narrator)
to be appropriate to have with alcohol/to down one's drink
to wolf down one's food (idiom); to devour ravenously/to gorge oneself
